name: Graveyard Bones
description:
Made in a weekend for the Ludum Dare 45 Jam.

You awake in a forgotten graveyard with nothing but you bones. Recover your old body parts and escape!

Controls

  • Right mouse key to move.
  • Left mouse key to attack.
  • Space to use things.

Features

  • Big open map to explore.
  • Each area feature different and unique gameplay mechanics.
  • Many different enemies to face.
  • Different music tracks for each area.

Missing or incomplete

  • Controls are bad and broken. Happens mostly on the main area, but the game is playable from start to finish.
  • Playtesting and balance.

Credits

  • Programming: Jesús González
  • Art: Ingrid Peñailillo
